Tue 26th January 2021
This folder contains the latest schemas for CaseHQ 4.9.6 Beta 7 as described in API LLD V1.4e but without AMend/Cancel hearing changes

Notes:

* Reusable .json is a common file to the hearing APIs
* hmctsSchema.json is OUR response hearing to HMI /hearings
* Other APIs broken into create* = POST; update* = PUT
